Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the New York State Real Property Tax Law, with respect to properties in the City of New York, to establish a declining property tax exemption on properties constructed or reconstructed where such construction or reconstruction includes the installation of a green roof.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a declining property tax exemption on properties constructed or reconstructed where such construction or reconstruction includes the installation of a green roof.
